00020 
00027 typedef struct
00028 {
00029   l4_uint32_t mod_start;  
00030   l4_uint32_t mod_end;    
00031   l4_uint32_t cmdline;    
00032   l4_uint32_t pad;    
00033 } l4util_mb_mod_t;
00034 
00035 
00043 typedef struct __attribute__((packed))
00044 {
00045   l4_uint32_t struct_size;  
00046   l4_uint64_t addr;   
00047   l4_uint64_t size;   
00048   l4_uint32_t type;   
00049   /* unspecified optional padding... */
00050 } l4util_mb_addr_range_t;
00051 
00052 #define l4util_mb_for_each_mmap_entry(i, mbi) \
00053   for (i = (l4util_mb_addr_range_t *) mbi->mmap_addr; \
00054        (unsigned long)i < mbi->mmap_addr + mbi->mmap_length; \
00055        i = (l4util_mb_addr_range_t *)((unsigned long)i + mmap->struct_size + sizeof (mmap->struct_size)))
00056 
00058 #define MB_ARD_MEMORY   1
00059 
00064 #define MB_ART_MEMORY   1  
00065 #define MB_ART_RESERVED 2  
00066 #define MB_ART_ACPI     3  
00068 #define MB_ART_NVS      4  
00069 #define MB_ART_UNUSABLE 5  
00073 typedef struct
00074 {
00075   l4_uint32_t size;   
00076   l4_uint8_t drive_number;  
00077   l4_uint8_t drive_mode;  
00078   l4_uint16_t drive_cylinders;  
00079   l4_uint8_t drive_heads; 
00080   l4_uint8_t drive_sectors; 
00081   l4_uint16_t drive_ports[0]; 
00082 } l4util_mb_drive_t;
00083 
00084 /* Drive Mode.  */
00085 #define MB_DI_CHS_MODE    0
00086 #define MB_DI_LBA_MODE    1
00087 
00088 
00090 typedef struct
00091 {
00092   l4_uint16_t version;
00093   l4_uint16_t cseg;
00094   l4_uint32_t offset;
00095   l4_uint16_t cseg_16;
00096   l4_uint16_t dseg_16;
00097   l4_uint16_t cseg_len;
00098   l4_uint16_t cseg_16_len;
00099   l4_uint16_t dseg_16_len;
00100 } l4util_mb_apm_t;
00101 
00102 
00104 typedef struct
00105 {
00106   l4_uint8_t signature[4];
00107   l4_uint16_t version;
00108   l4_uint32_t oem_string;
00109   l4_uint32_t capabilities;
00110   l4_uint32_t video_mode;
00111   l4_uint16_t total_memory;
00112   l4_uint16_t oem_software_rev;
00113   l4_uint32_t oem_vendor_name;
00114   l4_uint32_t oem_product_name;
00115   l4_uint32_t oem_product_rev;
00116   l4_uint8_t reserved[222];
00117   l4_uint8_t oem_data[256];
00118 } __attribute__((packed)) l4util_mb_vbe_ctrl_t;
00119 
00120 
00122 typedef struct
00123 {
00126   l4_uint16_t mode_attributes;
00127   l4_uint8_t win_a_attributes;
00128   l4_uint8_t win_b_attributes;
00129   l4_uint16_t win_granularity;
00130   l4_uint16_t win_size;
00131   l4_uint16_t win_a_segment;
00132   l4_uint16_t win_b_segment;
00133   l4_uint32_t win_func;
00134   l4_uint16_t bytes_per_scanline;
00139   l4_uint16_t x_resolution;
00140   l4_uint16_t y_resolution;
00141   l4_uint8_t x_char_size;
00142   l4_uint8_t y_char_size;
00143   l4_uint8_t number_of_planes;
00144   l4_uint8_t bits_per_pixel;
00145   l4_uint8_t number_of_banks;
00146   l4_uint8_t memory_model;
00147   l4_uint8_t bank_size;
00148   l4_uint8_t number_of_image_pages;
00149   l4_uint8_t reserved0;
00154   l4_uint8_t red_mask_size;
00155   l4_uint8_t red_field_position;
00156   l4_uint8_t green_mask_size;
00157   l4_uint8_t green_field_position;
00158   l4_uint8_t blue_mask_size;
00159   l4_uint8_t blue_field_position;
00160   l4_uint8_t reserved_mask_size;
00161   l4_uint8_t reserved_field_position;
00162   l4_uint8_t direct_color_mode_info;
00167   l4_uint32_t phys_base;
00168   l4_uint32_t reserved1;
00169   l4_uint16_t reversed2;
00174   l4_uint16_t linear_bytes_per_scanline;
00175   l4_uint8_t banked_number_of_image_pages;
00176   l4_uint8_t linear_number_of_image_pages;
00177   l4_uint8_t linear_red_mask_size;
00178   l4_uint8_t linear_red_field_position;
00179   l4_uint8_t linear_green_mask_size;
00180   l4_uint8_t linear_green_field_position;
00181   l4_uint8_t linear_blue_mask_size;
00182   l4_uint8_t linear_blue_field_position;
00183   l4_uint8_t linear_reserved_mask_size;
00184   l4_uint8_t linear_reserved_field_position;
00185   l4_uint32_t max_pixel_clock;
00186 
00187   /* The VBE spec says this structure should have a size of 256 bytes but
00188    * the described structure layout is only 255 bytes... */
00189   l4_uint8_t reserved3[189 + 1];
00191 } __attribute__ ((packed)) l4util_mb_vbe_mode_t;
00192 
00193 
00202 typedef struct
00203 {
00204   l4_uint32_t flags;    
00205   l4_uint32_t mem_lower;  
00206   l4_uint32_t mem_upper;  
00207   l4_uint32_t boot_device;  
00208   l4_uint32_t cmdline;    
00209   l4_uint32_t mods_count; 
00210   l4_uint32_t mods_addr;  
00212   union
00213   {
00214     struct
00215     {
00217       l4_uint32_t tabsize;
00218       l4_uint32_t strsize;
00219       l4_uint32_t addr;
00220       l4_uint32_t pad;
00221     }
00222     a;
00223     
00224     struct
00225     {
00227       l4_uint32_t num;
00228       l4_uint32_t size;
00229       l4_uint32_t addr;
00230       l4_uint32_t shndx;
00231     }
00232     e;
00233   }
00234   syms;
00235   
00236   l4_uint32_t mmap_length;  
00237   l4_uint32_t mmap_addr;  
00238   l4_uint32_t drives_length;  
00239   l4_uint32_t drives_addr;  
00240   l4_uint32_t config_table; 
00241   l4_uint32_t boot_loader_name; 
00242   l4_uint32_t apm_table;  
00243   l4_uint32_t vbe_ctrl_info;  
00244   l4_uint32_t vbe_mode_info;  
00245   l4_uint16_t vbe_mode;   
00246   l4_uint16_t vbe_interface_seg; 
00247   l4_uint16_t vbe_interface_off; 
00248   l4_uint16_t vbe_interface_len; 
00249 } l4util_mb_info_t;
